resources.string: My Name is Vidya Az Zahra, Im a student at Tadulako University and now im 20th years old, i love design and i love watching Disney movies, my favorite drink is matcha. Also, my MBTI is INFJ

string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: My Name is Vidya Az Zahra, Im a student at Tadulako University and now im 20th years old, i love design and i love watching Disney movies, my favorite drink is matcha. Also, my MBTI is INFJ
My Name is Nydia Eldiana, Im a student at Hasanuddin University and now im 19th years old, i love drawing thats why i choose Architecture for my major, i love listening to music. And my MBTI is ENFP.

My Name is Nadia Rizkia Firdausi, Im a student at Hasanuddin University and now im 19th years old, i love helping people thats why i choose Public Health for my major, i love going anywhere exploring places, my MBTI is ENFP.

My Name is Ilma Cahya Putri, Im a student of Poltekes Palu, and now im 20th years old, i love helping people thats why i choose Public Health for my major, i love making a food for my loved ones. My MBTI is INFP.
